body:
If I remove this line compilation fails with "no matching constructor " error message.
`error: no matching constructor for initialization of 'tensorflow::WriteFileOp'`
`note: candidate constructor (the implicit copy constructor) not viable: no known conversion from '::tensorflow::OpKernelConstruction *' to 'const tensorflow::WriteFileOp' for 1st argument
class WriteFileOp : public OpKernel {`
